name: Defend Miru I
objective: Meet with Lieutenant Omar at the Military Base

first_task_locations.name: Military Base
first_task_locations.description: One of Miru’s military bases, where training and preparation towards destroying the Qayral and defending Miru takes place.

goal: Lieutenant Omar recognizes the warrior, since they look like their older brother. Lieutenant Omar notices the determination on the warrior's face to become stronger and defend Miru.

name: Defend Miru II
objective: Train with Lieutenant Omar to prepare for the Qayral
first_tasks: train with Lieutenant Omar, then fight the Qayral

first_task_locations.name: Military Base
first_task_locations.description: One of Miru’s military bases, where training and preparation towards destroying the Qayral and defending Miru takes place.

quest_giver.name: Lieutenant Omar
quest_giver.description: an experienced militant who holds allegiance to defending Miru and protecting its people from the Qayral and other dangers. He leads an army of 200, training and preparing for battle.

reward.name: Military Sword
reward.description: A strong sword used by Miru militants

goal: Lieutenant Omar decides to train the warrior intensively and reward him with the Military Sword once the training is finished. After training, Lieutenant Omar will send the warrior to fight the Qayral.

first_task_locations.name: Jinn's Lair
first_task_locations.description: A dark cave teeming with bloodlusted Qayral. There seems to be some dark energy emanating from the cave.

quest_giver.name: Lieutenant Omar
quest_giver.description: an experienced militant who holds allegiance to defending Miru and protecting its people from the Qayral and other dangers. He leads an army of 200, training and preparing for battle.

items.name: Qayral's Scale
items.description: A shiny scale from the skin of a Qayral. There seems to be something radiating from it, making one feel very uneasy. Only those that have special abilities are able to get this scale of a Qayral.

enemies.name: Qayral
enemies.description: Large, reptilian beasts that live in Jinn’s Lair. They target the people of Miru constantly, hoping to break into it and devour the people there.

name: Defend Miru IIII
objective: Report back to Lieutenant Omar about your findings

first_task_locations.name: Military Base
first_task_locations.description: One of Miru’s military bases, where training and preparation towards destroying the Qayral and defending Miru takes place.

quest_giver.description: Given immediately after acquiring a Qayral Scale

items.name: Qayral's Scale
items.description: A shiny scale from the skin of a Qayral. There seems to be something radiating from it, making one feel very uneasy. Only those that have special abilities are able to get this scale of a Qayral.

enemies.name: Qayral
enemies.description: Large, reptilian beasts that live in Jinn’s Lair. They target the people of Miru constantly, hoping to break into it and devour the people there.

goal: Lieutenant Omar is pleased with warrior's report and takes the Qayral's Scale. Lieutenant Omar commends the warrior.

name: Chosen One I
objective: talk to Lieutenant Omar to learn about the Greatsword of Nerus

first_task_locations.name: Elria
first_task_locations.description: A beautiful, prosperous, and grand city, home to many of the mystic and physical arts. Its tall, white and gold structure beams elegance and sophistication. The city is a bustling economic hub, diverse, and well fortified.

quest_giver.name: Lieutenant Omar
quest_giver.description: an experienced militant who holds allegiance to defending Miru and protecting its people from the Qayral and other dangers. He leads an army of 200, training and preparing for battle.

items.name: Greatsword of Nerus
items.description: Stuck in an engraved stone, there was a greatsword was used by the great Swordsman Nerus. One of the strongest warriors to have ever existed. Many have tried to pull the sword to no avail.

goal: He is fascinated by the warrior's abilities and tells the warrior about the greatsword of Nerus.

name: Chosen One II
objective: Try to pick up Greatsword of Nerus
first_tasks: pick up the Greatsword of Nerus
